data.meta_description: Join us on July 12 for Devex World! This year, 1,000 thinkers, doers, change-makers, and expert practitioners will once again converge in person for Devex World in Washington, D.C, as well as online everywhere. Attendees to the fourth edition of this unique global development event can expect a full day of inspiring, interactive, and collaborative sessions with one focus: turning ideas into action.
data.text: Devex World will be live and in person at the Mead Center for American Theater in Washington, DC. Devex understands the power of bringing people together in person and the importance of doing so safely. Proof of vaccination is required to enter the building, and masks must be worn in the venue unless eating or drinking in designated areas. Read more about the Mead Center for American Theaterâ€™s health and safety protocols here.
